items.name: Innovators
items.description: This segment represents users who enjoy trying the latest and greatest features and providing early feedback.

watson-incident-text.name: Incident recording with Watson - text
watson-incident-text.description: This feature enables support for capturing and analyzing incident records using text and Watson sentiment analysis.

watson-incident-speech.name: Incident recording with Watson - speech
watson-incident-speech.description: This feature enables support for capturing incident descriptions using speech, automatically setting the incident severity based on sentiment analysis.

items.name: Early Adopters
items.description: This segment contains users who are not necessarily willing to be the first participants, but enjoy being on the cutting edge of technological enhancements, and offering feedback.

watson-incident-text.name: Incident recording with Watson - text
watson-incident-text.description: This feature enables support for capturing and analyzing incident records using text and Watson sentiment analysis.

watson-incident-speech.name: Incident recording with Watson - speech
watson-incident-speech.description: This feature enables support for capturing incident descriptions using speech, automatically setting the incident severity based on sentiment analysis.

items.name: General Population
items.description: This segment reflects the majority population of normal users

watson-incident-text.name: Incident recording with Watson - text
watson-incident-text.description: This feature enables support for capturing and analyzing incident records using text and Watson sentiment analysis.

watson-incident-speech.name: Incident recording with Watson - speech
watson-incident-speech.description: This feature enables support for capturing incident descriptions using speech, automatically setting the incident severity based on sentiment analysis.
